casebody.data:
734 A.2d 1146 ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND v. Ritz Robert YAP. Misc. AG No. 23,

Sept. Term, 1999.

Court of Appeals of Maryland. Aug. 10, 1999.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition to suspend attorney from the practice of law filed in the above-entitled matter in accordance with Md. Rule 16-716 and, no response having been made to the show cause order by the respondent, it is this 10th day of August, 1999

ORDERED, by the Court of Appeals of Maryland, that the petition to suspend be, and it is hereby, GRANTED and Ritz Robert Yap is suspended, effective immediately, from the practice of law until further order of this Court; and it is further

ORDERED that the Clerk of this Court shall forthwith strike the name of Ritz Robert Yap from the register of attorneys in this Court and shall certify that fact to the Trustees of the Clients’ Security Trust Fund and the clerks of all judicial tribunals in the State in accordance with Rule 16-713.
